entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestDecompression middleware #40080
  • [Migration] Figure out a story for sharing session state with ASP.NET apps #40079
  • [Theme] Add support for migrating .NET Framework apps to .NET Core #40078
  • .NET Core RedirectToAction method fails when passing param #40075
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2022-21986 | .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #40072
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: API Controllers Actions try to infer parameters from DI #40071
    Discussions
  • Sending byte array with SignalR NewtonsoftJsonProtocol #40069
  • Method not found error. Project in net core 6.0. I use Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity 2.2.0 #40068
    Discussions
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation bug with AddRazorRuntimeCompilation() to an ASP.NET Core Web App (MVC) project #40066
  • Possible incorrect sorting in KnownHeaders.cs #40062
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyIgnoresItsOwnDirectoryWithRelativePathSegmentWhenCopying #40059
  • Blazor InputText FormatValueAsString behaves in a strange way #40058
  • Blazor exception thrown when visiting a non-existent url and then trying to interact with page when RenderMode="Server" #40056
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #40055
  • The manifest embedded file provider does not recognize the empty string as the root subpath. #40053
    Backlog
  • Disable BlazorTemplates.Tests from running in quarantined pipelines #40051

Closed

  • Add metadata for IFormFile usage with minimal actions #35175
  • Better way to detect "Failed to start the HttpConnection before stop() was called." #38893
    7.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #39827
  • Add support for implicit inference of `FromServices` for types that appear in DI #39667
    7.0-preview2
  • Unexpected exception using WsFederation authentication with React SPA template #39896
  • .NET CORE6 + ReactJS Template #40064
  • Blazor CascadingTypeParameter does not pass type parameter to children that have multiple type parameters #39994
  • Naming convention confusion #40057
  • Web Component - Virtualization - API Modification proposal - ItemsProviderRequest #40031
    Backlog
  • Update project templates to use LibMan #40052
  • Razor parser confused by using reserved keywords as identifiers #40049
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #39980
  • Network Access by default for Web applications #40019
  • On M1 machine, build 5.0 / 3.1 Grpc project show an error: Google.Protobuf.Tools cannot determine host OS and CPU". #39394
    5.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Update 5.0/6.0 SiteExtension versions #40077
    area-infrastructure
  • Update README Roadmap, Related Projects for .NET 7 #40076
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #40074
    5.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #40073
    6.0.x
  • test install-scripts #40061
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Quarantine ShadowCopyIgnoresItsOwnDirectoryWithRelativePathSegmentWhenCopying #40060
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Better way to detect "Failed to start the HttpConnection before stop() was called." #40018
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Renaming DisableImplicitFromServicesParameters option #40047
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview2
  • GetSimpleDisplayText: explain how it works #40065
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Update to SDK 7.0.100-preview.2.22103.2 #40041
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, 7.0-preview2
  • Use `-noBuild` in second build steps of test jobs #39998
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2
  • Adding support to infer FromServices parameters #39926
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • Add nullable annotations to Identity.Extensions #40007
    area-identity
  • Log IIS BadHttpRequestExceptions at debug level #40002
    area-runtime
  • Activate components by default #39997
    area-blazor
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Error when Http/1.0 attempts to upgrade #40006
    area-runtime
  • Support OpenAPI summaries, descriptions, and examples for minimal APIs #40045
    area-web-frameworks
